name: Physical Lab Godot
description:
Physical Lab is the physics based 2D platformer shooter once made in Clickteam Fusion 2.5 ported to Godot!

Controls: 

A and D keys - move

Space - jump

Q - open sandbox menu

W and S keys - move up and down ladders

Shift - sprint

R - reload

Left Click - fire

Right Click - alt fire

G - grenade (broken af)

E - use

F - flashlight
